title: Historical 3D Dioramas
description: This project showcases detailed diorama scenes with pristine and ruined states, emphasizing historical accuracy and environmental storytelling. Each model is meticulously crafted to highlight textures, lighting, and atmosphere that immerse viewers in the narrative behind the scenes. Through careful use of color palettes and composition, the dioramas bring ancient civilizations to life, reflecting both their grandeur and decay.
closing: Through these works, I hope to preserve the visual beauty of lost civilizations.
